example.eg: We stopped at the top of the mountain to admire the landscape.
example.egtrans: 我们逗留在山顶欣赏风景。

example.eg: They bought a landscape at the art auction.
example.egtrans: 他们在艺术拍卖会上买了幅风景画。

example.eg: My parents are going to landscape the front of their new house.
example.egtrans: 我父母打算用园艺来美化新房前面的园地。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为…设计园林景观, 用园艺来美化…

example.eg: Jim printed the table out in landscape format.
example.egtrans: 吉姆用横向排版打印那个表格。

example.eg: Our son is studying landscape architecture.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 景观设计, 景观设计学

example.eg: Capability Brown was a famous 18th century English landscape gardener.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 庭园美化师, 园艺师

example.eg: I know nothing at all about landscape gardening – I'll have to hire a professional.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 庭园设计, 园艺设计

example.eg: John Constable is one of England's most popular landscape painters.
I prefer to paint portraits as I'm not very good at landscape painting.
Lake Mungo is said to resemble a lunar landscape.
